Zava

She responds.

"I never thought you didn't need me, sir. But this is the only way. 
If I put the bomb anywhere else, it will only destroy a section of 
the ship, and some could live. On the engine, it would set off a 
chain reaction making the entire ship go up. And if I leave, they'll 
know about it and look for it. Believe me sir, if there was anyway I 
could get out of this I would. But it's the only way to ensure entire 
Predacon destruction. Good-bye Lord Deemos."
